item.description:
We will meet up with other singles for brunch at the Center Street Cafe on Center Street in JP, at 11am, before heading over to the Sam Adams Brewery to tour the Brewery at 1pm.

It is not good to drink beer on an empty stomach, hence this Brunch before the Tour!

The Center Street Cafe is a firm favorite amongst local JP residents and others who live further way. Many people come to JP on weekends especially for their brunch.

The Center St Cafe is located at:
669a Centre Street • Jamaica Plain, MA • 617-524-9217

If you're taking public transport, the No. 39 Bus goes right by the Cafe. You can pick up the No. 39 bus at Copley Square, anywhere along Huntington Ave, or at the end of the Green E Line at Heath Street.

Please note: I need a firm Yes (or No) RSVP for Brunch by THURSDAY Sept. 4th so that we can coordinate with the restaurant accordingly.

For more info on the Cafe and their menus, see Center Street Cafe. Please note that their web-site is undergoing some changes so not all info may be displayed at all times.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the bunch of tall(er) folks & a blonde with a foreign accent
item.name: Brunch at Center Street Cafe in JP
